page.title: 02Middleton Tyas Church
page.content: The name of the church is{St. Michael {and All Angels.} The oldest gravestone is a lovely grave cover like a canopy, beautifully carved in stone. It is about 13th Century so it is some 700 years old and belonged to a very rich man but we do not know who he was. There have probably been two churches on the same site and there is an idea that there might have been a Saxon church and certainly a Norman church because there is now a beautiful row of Norman arches. There was a Norman church built round about the 13th Century, then a little bit later, in the 14th Century, it was extended. In Victorian times it was heavily {restored by}a man called{Sir Gilbert {Scott.}
